The Abyssal orphan is a boss pet that resembles the scions that are encountered during the Abyssal Sire boss fight.

Players have a 5/128 (1/25.6) chance of obtaining the abyssal orphan when they place an unsired on the Font of Consumption behind The Overseer. As an unsired is a 1/100 drop, this effectively makes the chance of an abyssal orphan 1/2,560. When the unsired is placed into the font, if the pet chance is rolled, a message will appear in the chatbox stating The Font appears to have revitalised the Unsired!. If the player has joined a Clan and Loot broadcasts are enabled when they receive the pet, a non-standard pet notification message will be broadcasted: Player feels like he's acquired something special: Abyssal orphan

On death, if a player loses their pet (as a follower or in your inventory) it will wander around for 30 seconds before disappearing completely.

Players can pay a one-time fee of 500,000 coins to Probita in East Ardougne to have this pet insured. Should the pet be lost while insured, it can be reclaimed for 1,000,000 coins.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
23 June 2021
(update)

The abyssal orphan inventory icon has been slightly tweaked to hide the concealed model above the icon.

22 October 2015
(update)

Abyssal orphans were given a graphical update to resemble the Abyssal Sire instead of larger spawns.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The pet has the highest drop rate for a one-off pet at 5/128 (1/25.6). This is due to the time it takes to obtain an unsired, whose drop rate is 1/100.
  • Dialogue Option 2 for male players is a reference to The Empire Strikes Back where Darth Vader informs Luke that he is in fact his father, followed by Luke dismissing the claim as impossible.
